I know it's really good it's really easy

and you also don't need just a little
tiny bit of veg oil or like a light very
light olive oil which I have preheating
in a large heavy bottom pot this is
really easy it's not a soup that's going
to cook all day however you can Brown
the beef and then add everything into
the slow cooker and let it cook all day
long so really it's really up to you if
you want it if you want to eat it within
a half an hour you can do it this way or
if you want to cook it low and slow you
